summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.0°C) and outside temperature (up 2.3°C).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 3056 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), dew point temperature (up 3.0°C), outside temperature (up 2.3°C), and inside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, pleasant humidity levels and light winds will prevail. Possible light showers, occasional overcast conditions, and a mix of sun and clouds. Weather patterns to stay the same.
